text:

anticipated new movie

Now, if you love learning English
with movies, TV series and celebrities,
have you subscribe to our channel yet?

I highly recommend you do this

fast speaking natives
 without getting lost, without missing the

jokes and without subtitles.
Just like Digal who says

they get completely engrossed

So hit the Subscribe button and
 bell down below to do that now.
Now, with our Fluent With Friends Course,

you can have a lot of fun learning

But the best part is

and just sign up now. You'll receive these

three mini lessons

What are you waiting for?
I hope you enjoyed today's lesson.
Well done for making it to the end.

If you're a fan of Lady Gaga like me,

lesson we made with her next.
